details.name: description
details.old_value:
The /video command is useful to convert a demo to an .avi file. It should be used when replaying a demo.
However, this command actually results in a client crash, with only the a few frames compiled into the .avi file (and the speed seems to be sped up too).
details.new_value:
The /video command is useful to convert a demo to an .avi file. It should be used when replaying a demo. However, this command actually returns to main menu, with only the a few frames compiled into the .avi file (and the speed seems to be sped up too). Info in console: 
Wrote 10:11 frames to videos/0001.avi
Sys_LoadGameDll -> FS_CL_ExtractFromPakFile(/home/user/.etlegacy, legacy, ui.mp.i386.so)
Sys_LoadDll(./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so)... failed: "Failed loading ./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so: ./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
Sys_LoadDll(/home/user/.etlegacy/legacy/ui.mp.i386.so)... succeeded
Sys_LoadDll(ui) found vmMain function at 0x88ee3d71
Initializing Legacy ui v2.74-346-ge17180b
152 UI cvars in use.
Total favourite servers restored: 0
execing etlegacy.cfg

journals.notes:
I don't know but does this: #721 have something to do with it too?
Avidemo function seems to be all broken.

-*S
Yep, haven't seen that one. Closing now.

subject: /video command doesn't work as expected
description:
The /video command is useful to convert a demo to an .avi file. It should be used when replaying a demo. However, this command actually returns to main menu, with only the a few frames compiled into the .avi file (and the speed seems to be sped up too). Info in console: 
Wrote 10:11 frames to videos/0001.avi
Sys_LoadGameDll -> FS_CL_ExtractFromPakFile(/home/user/.etlegacy, legacy, ui.mp.i386.so)
Sys_LoadDll(./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so)... failed: "Failed loading ./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so: ./legacy/ui.mp.i386.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
Sys_LoadDll(/home/user/.etlegacy/legacy/ui.mp.i386.so)... succeeded
Sys_LoadDll(ui) found vmMain function at 0x88ee3d71
Initializing Legacy ui v2.74-346-ge17180b
152 UI cvars in use.
Total favourite servers restored: 0
execing etlegacy.cfg
